title: Lines in relief: woodcut and block printing
creator_credit: Bert Van Bork and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Shows how a fine woodcut is made, explaining the selection of tools and materials, the transfer of the design, and the techniques used in cutting the block. Illustrates the step by step process of printing a woodcut in several colors. Includes a brief review of the history of woodcuts and block printing from the Middle Ages to the present.
